txt.en: 'The Rushgore is the swampy land between the River Limlight and the Great River, and it is home to many foul creatures. It is patrolled by Edbrit, who was a strong warrior in his younger days and has now learned the wisdom he lacked, making him even stronger. He is given to loneliness, and is overfond of speaking with strangers and travellers he meets on the road.'
